content.description:
Same start as Glass Sliders. Aim for the hand crack in the left side of the roof.              

Roof Arete Left: Red - Divya's Big Nose, Yellow - Glass Sliders, Green - Roof Project, Blue - Captive Corner, White - One Shot, Purple - One Shot Workaround
content.location: The Green route on the beta photo.

content.description: Coming out from under the upper roof will tie you up into a Pretzel and so can climbing the off-width in the beginning.  Start in the inside corner and climb the awkward off-width up to the ledge below the roof.  Travers out left under the roof and move up under the next roof.  Turn to the right and reach out above the roof and slightly around the corner for an ideal blind hold to layback on.  Figure out how to step around the corner crux.  Follow the small finger crack to the top.
content.location: Roof Arete outcrop, Pretzel is the Yellow route on the topo below. Blue route is Glass Sliders.

content.description:
Start on the wall just right of the overhanging portion.  Climb the wall then traverse left just above the lip the roof. Follow One Shot to the top.               

Roof Arete Left: Red - Divya's Big Nose, Yellow - Glass Sliders, Green - Roof Project, Blue - Captive Corner, White - One Shot, Purple - One Shot Workaround
content.location: The Purple route on the beta photo.

content.description:
Start beneath the roof on the right side of the arête at a thin vertical seam. Climb the wall and pull the roof just left of its furthest protrusion. Continue up the steep wall to the top.              

Roof Arete Left: Red - Divya's Big Nose, Yellow - Glass Sliders, Green - Roof Project, Blue - Captive Corner, White - One Shot, Purple - One Shot Workaround
content.location: The White route on the beta photo.

content.description:
Start midway between One Shot Workaround and the corner to the right. Climb the dark colored face to the top.               

Roof Arete Right Side: Purple - One Shot Workaround, Orange - On The Sly, Green - The Dark Tower
content.location: The Orange route in the beta photo.

content.description:
Start on the wall under the big roof on the left side of the arête. Climb the right side of the overhanging to a small platform until under the roof.  Traverse left using underclings following the roof crack out, then move up to the upper roof and follow it out left. Climb the left facing corner to the top. Video Beta youtube.com/watch?v=G_QQdDS…

Roof Arete Left: Red - Divya's Big Nose, Yellow - Glass Sliders, Green - Roof Project, Blue - Captive Corner, White - One Shot, Purple - One Shot Workaround
content.location: The Yellow route on the Roof Arete beta photo.

content.description:
Start immediately in front of the big dead tree on the far left of the wall. Work up the face until the left facing inside corner can be reached.                

Roof Arete Left: Red - Divya's Big Nose, Yellow - Glass Sliders, Green - Roof Project, Blue - Captive Corner, White - One Shot, Purple - One Shot Workaround
content.location: The Pink route on the Roof Arete Left Side.

content.description:
Start on the far right of the Roof Arete wall where it meets the left wall of Ed Rocks.  Climb the corner to the top. It’s easier if you stem wide or use holds on the left face. The goal is to stay in the corner.               

Roof Arete Right Side: Purple - One Shot Workaround, Orange - On The Sly, Green - The Dark Tower
content.location: The Green route in the beta photo.

content.description:
Start on the nose of the arête where a seam of quartz splits the face. Climb the quartz seam and crack past the first roof on the left then the second roof on the right.   Continue up the left face with the arête at your right hand side to the top. A harder variant moves right above the second roof and continues up on the right side of the arete.  5.9+               

John Kelbel on Captive Corner
content.location: The Blue route on the beta photo.

content.description: This delightful flowing line moves through thin sharp horizontal edges.  You can either start on "One Shot" or over to the left as the topo shows.  Starting on the left climb up on top of the block that makes up a 4" wide ledge. Followed by a delicate face move to the right which allows you to join with "One Shot" at the bottom of the first roof.  Move left to a horizontal under the next roof and then shoot straight up the wall on 3 more small horizontals.  There are a few more delicate moves to finish off the climb. Which climbs straight up in between "Captive Corner Variation Finish" and "One Shot" which is the more challenging section of rock.
content.location: Roof Arete outcrop,  Yellow route on the topo below is Autumn Blaze.Blue route is One Shot and the Orange route is Captive Corner Variation Finish.

content.description:
The Roof Arete is a large blocky arête which has several rather large overhangs. All top systems here are from trees.              

Roof Arete Left: Red - Divya's Big Nose, Yellow - Glass Sliders, Green - Roof Project, Blue - Captive Corner, White - One Shot, Purple - One Shot Workaround
